website_summaries.verdict: The Asus ZenFone 3 Deluxe is big, good-looking unlocked Android phone with powerful hardware that's held back by a disappointing camera and an overwhelming software layer.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this phone for about 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone for about 5 months, then out of nowhere the LCD went blank the phone is spotless not even a scratch. I agree with some of the reviews on here Asus customer service gave me an RMA number and told me that my phone was still under warranty, I shipped the phone to Asus (shipping at my expens), I just received an email with an invoice for a whopping $261.00 that's unacceptable. They almost had me as a loyal customer unfortunately I would never buy an Asus again.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone.  Keep it up Asus.
customer_reviews.text: A great phone. You really cannot beat the price on these phones from Asus. I had a Samsung Galaxy once, but why spend the extra $300-$400 on something that you drop and break, or simply just goes sideways after 2 years max. Cellphones have become insanely expensive. People used to choke on the cost for a new laptop, but these are even higher in price and they generally don't even last half the time of a decent laptop. This device is perfectly well rounded. It takes great pictures is fast and does anything most people would want it to do. And it looks just as sharp as many of the flagship phones out there. Think about it.
customer_reviews.author: Just another shopper

customer_reviews.title: Software is the thing turned me off
customer_reviews.text: It's giving me problem when I connected to my computer. I had another zenfone 2 and it seems causing conflict connect another Zen phone. I had emails back and forth with the tech support but it's going nowhere. That's a shame. This is definitely a gorgeous phone. Really well built phone. Earset is also awesome. Spec is great! AMOLED screen is absolutely beautiful. Another thing is the camera is also a bummer. The image is not as sharp as I would like. The size of the images are huge but the quality was not that good. I was comparing to its previous generation. Again, the hardware is awesone for this phone but the software is dragging the overall performance.
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: This phone is by far the best one I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This phone is by far the best one I have ever used. I've used all the Samsung and iPhone's up to the 7's and this phone costs less and out performs them all. The phone does take a bit to get used to but is well worth the time it takes to adjust to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Presentation, Packaging, Technology, and Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband and he absolutely loves it. This product is well worth the price ASUS is king at building computer parts so happy they are taking on phones now. Presentation is key my friends and they have the whole package even the box it comes it hits other companies out of the park. Other phones on the market are overpriced and you can't do near as much with them. I will without a shadow of a doubt be getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki_515

customer_reviews.title: You don't need to spend $1000 for a great phone!
customer_reviews.text: My first 'Droid after being an iPhone owner since my first smart phone. Nice screen, takes great pics, the Asus UI is easy to use. The switchover from iOS was painless and not nearly as rough as I expected. I do sort of miss having a home button on the front of the phone as it helped me sort out which was the top and bottom. After two months I still sometimes start with the phone upside down.
customer_reviews.author: T.H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on February 14, 2017 - fast forward to October 2020 and it is still working. I had some issues with the camera not focusing 3 months ago but I think it is more of a software glitch because it is working now. I ordered this item together with case and screen protector from Amazon. I am planning to give this to one of my nieces because it is still in good working condition (if I decided to upgrade to a newer phone).
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: Its thin, light, powerful, aluminum body for durability! I say again, I LOVE THIS PHONE! 6 Gb RAM, 64 Gb storage, fast quad core processor...essentially a laptop in the size of a phone!
customer_reviews.author: AmazCus23

customer_reviews.title: Great phone! Great price! 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: One hell of a phone! This is my second phone from Asus, and this one is a hell of a lot better than the last one in the last one was pretty damn good, till I broke it on cement. And that one still functioned for another year! This is clearly an upgrade on an already wonderful product and I would recommend it to anybody especially at the price that I paid, I believe the second round $250 give or take
customer_reviews.author: KimPossible!

customer_reviews.title: This phone is not durable. In under a year ...
customer_reviews.text: This phone is not durable. In under a year, it has formed cracks on the screen starting from the top speaker. I can only assume something in my pocket was able to push up against it hard enough to cause the cracks since it had been in my pocket all day. And to top it off, in under a year it was officially stopped working. The screen flashes, but thats it. Its hard to make out any features and the screen is unresponsive to touch. Time to buy a new phone I suppose, and it certainly won't be this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Dyer

customer_reviews.title: stick with something local...
customer_reviews.text: for the money, you can do better. 5 months in and the screen is black, dead. no idea as to why. no warning, glitches, just dead. for that type money, 2 stars is generous. i have no need for anything that doesn't work, people too...
customer_reviews.author: totally at peace

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and well designed phone. The look is quite stunning. ASUS update came within 48hrs. The phone now runs on Android 7.0. Call volume is good and the camera is excellent in good lighting but average in poor lights. Can say much about battery life since I'm not a heavy user, but it last a whole day and more on moderate wise.
customer_reviews.author: Ashford

customer_reviews.title: Died After 1 Week
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this phone. Died after one week showing the black screen of death and no customer support when I tried contacting. Would love to hear from ASUS and fix this situation!
customer_reviews.author: JWPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality on close up pictures
customer_reviews.text: The camera quality on this phone terrible. We buy Asus phones exclusively the camera on this is about to convert me to a different brand. I cannot take pictures close up (closer than 8-10 inches). They are blurry. We've tried everything. My parents both have the same phone and they don't have this issue. I thought maybe it was all the phones of this type, but it appears to be just mine. I have not been able to find a way to contact the seller, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the price. Pretty quick, looks and feels good, and charges incredibly quick. Only complaint is it will sometimes, almost daily, have an issue when unlocking and acts as though as if I just docked a new memory card. Not sure if a phone issue or a sd card issue.
customer_reviews.author: KnowsEnoughToBeTrouble

customer_reviews.title: nice product, but problems with taking series of pictures
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice product overall, except when taking multiple pictures (say I'm at an event, or sports) relatively fast, it seems to have a tendency to choke and not respond, even with all memory cleared up, before taking the pictures series.
customer_reviews.author: cos

customer_reviews.title: I used it for 14+ months and it is sturdy due to it's metal frame
customer_reviews.text: This phone is well built and works without issues. I used it for 14+ months and it is sturdy due to it's metal frame. I dropped it to 4 stars instead of 5 because the power button wore out just now. I am very hard on my phones though. It did have a ding mark from a small drop shortly after I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Love my phone
customer_reviews.text: Much better phone than the ASUS I had before this one doesn't over heat like the version before the 3 . Still haven't learned all the accessibility .
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to quickly replace my other phone because it wasn't working properly, and I am glad to have purchased this Asus phone. I looked around for an inexpensive phone and came across this. I've had it for a few days now and it is extremely good for the price. I definitely recommend this phone because it's inexpensive, good in specs, and overall great.
customer_reviews.author: J.D.T.

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I was thinking about buying a new phone. I had the iPhone 6 16gb version before buying this ZenFone and it was horrible, I could barely download apps because I had no storage. This ZenFone 3 is amazing and the price is so good. I absolutely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this phone because it had great storage, great RAM and great camera
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone because it had great storage, great RAM and great camera...all that great stuff amounted to nil when the phone suddenly started rebooting itself, phone hasn't turned on in almost a week. Tried contacting the seller, no luck, ASUS does not have customer care, checked some online forums and saw quite a few similar complaints about this phone and the zenfone 2 as well, seems like ASUS just can't get it right. I am now stuck with a $500 phone that does not work. I would not recommend this product to anyone, DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: phone is a paper weight
customer_reviews.text: had issues with it since the day I got it asus warranty isn't a warranty at all cause when you contact there support center they do not help at all its like a run around for them till you get so fed up that you quit bothering them if anyone reads this make note stay away from asus
customer_reviews.author: none-ya

customer_reviews.title: Signal problems
customer_reviews.text: The signal strength is low for everything, putting the cellphone in your backpocket can make interference for the bluetooth sometimes, if you turn on the bluetooth for headphones while using the hotspot you get lots and LOTS of interference, the mobile data for some reason can really mess up your gps to the point you cant use it unless you turn it off (mobile data). For each of this things I wrote a complain in the service center only to get "thats the way it is" and for the last point i didnt get a response
customer_reviews.author: Andres Zevallos Duran

customer_reviews.title: Big flaw it had
customer_reviews.text: Its the second Asus phone I had. Charging ping failed within 3 months. Random restarts. I would not recommend this phone. Couldnt find a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyo Muk

customer_reviews.title: Great signal, great sound
customer_reviews.text: ASUS Zenphone 3 Deluxe surpassed all my expectations. Great signal,great sound, very clear screen and confortable in the hand. Specefecations are fantastic,they outshine all other phone models. The only problem I have encountered is that above a 128gb micro sd the phone laga and sometimes freezes during file browsing. The best expansion card for this phone to store files is a 128 micro sd card.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wright

customer_reviews.title: BADASS!
customer_reviews.text: Best phone I have ever used. I am not a picture taker, more "gamer when I can and where I am". This phone for gaming is badass! Oh I use it to make phone calls also.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I love it. At first it didn't work well with my t-mobile service but with little toying around with the settings I got it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone. This was me trying something new aside ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone. This was me trying something new aside from the latest iPhones and Galaxy's. This was a great choice. Very fast, awesome screen clarity, and lots of storage.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer malone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone, works as well as any of my previous Samsung phones!
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: A decent replacement to a samsung or lg, but ...
customer_reviews.text: A decent replacement to a samsung or lg, but had a few problems that you think would've been fixed a lot earlier via an update.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond Tyler

customer_reviews.title: fragile
customer_reviews.text: i like the asus deluxe but i fell it one time and the scresn was broken.. the phone is very fragile... i let it fixed and its working just right num...
customer_reviews.author: Martina Lee

customer_reviews.title: No MMS
customer_reviews.text: I like the picture and colors, it is fast when you use internet. Con: it does not support MMS, we are in 2018, and you built a phone that can not support MMS?, Please, it will be better if you fix this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera! Fast Processor. Excellent Screen. awesome system, android 7.0, with regular updates from ASUS, improving the functionality of the device and remedying any issues, it any. High quality Bluetooth audio. Large SDHC card capacity, up to 2TB. 4G, Works with T-Mobile.
customer_reviews.author: 99.9% Online Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Roll the dice.
customer_reviews.text: almost a year with this phone. its a lot of flash. but performance wise. bloatware slows the huge 6gb of ram. what a shame. i have had issues with a blown screen, cracked camera cover on the back side. software.. maybe i got a friday phone..dunno... do not use ASUS SERVICE.****. i wont be buying a second phone from them because of just that.
customer_reviews.author: L, L.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended that I buy this phone and I have no complaints at all. The finger touch to unlock is very convenient especially when on the go. It's a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Raynette Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: A powerhouse of phone.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone that handles everything I throw at it. Definitely a computer in the palm of your hand. Wish it was easier to find accessories.
customer_reviews.author: ConSpire

customer_reviews.title: I loved this phone
customer_reviews.text: I loved this phone. It's a great phone slick looking, all metal body, nice pictures taking, full HD video recording. I think the battery is a bit small compares to others only 3000mAh.
customer_reviews.author: DTran

customer_reviews.title: poor on the internet connection, week battery
customer_reviews.text: very poor on internet connection , i bought this phone and in the same time still have my old phone ASUS ZENPHONE 2 and i also bought ASUS ZENPHONE 3 , while this phone was connected to the internet but not receiving emails or whatsapp messages,etc, on my old phone had it instantly as well as on ASUS ZENPHONE 3 ,,,,,, wish it was good on the internet connection cause that's what i mainly use , need to be connected permanently. Another bad thing about this phone is that after using it like half an hour you're out of battery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This phone looks beautiful but it is actually a big disappointment. I could only make or receive calls when I stepped out of my residence, and once I step back in, it will show on the screen "No cellular network ". I changed network provider three times but the problem still persisted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the functions are easier an the camera is unbelievably better.
customer_reviews.text: I also have a zenfone 2 and everything about the 3 deluxe has improved. All the functions are easier an the camera is unbelievably better.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Dude, don’t buy it. I bought two of them, they are trash. After a year they are both dead. The battery became a problem really quick. The screen of mine became purple. The camera wouldn’t focus right anymore. Better just go with an iPhone. I was charging it 3 or 4 times a day after a year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PHONE!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived overnight as we needed the phone ASAP. Works great as we were just replacing an existing Zenfone 3 Deluxe that was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Wsclose

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone, very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, no issues so far. I just works. Like the memory capability, don't have to delete pictures in order to update software.
customer_reviews.author: Cruise

customer_reviews.title: worked great for 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought the phone, worked great for 4 months, then the screen froze, the phone works but there is no touch screen anymore and now I have an expensive brick. Yes.... I did perform a factory reset and how I miss you Blackberry.
customer_reviews.author: Delta 1

customer_reviews.title: Faulty screen
customer_reviews.text: Its a super nice phone had it for all of one month n then my screen went black. Took it in to see what the problem is to repair it n then found out the ribbon for the screen had broke n now I'm stuck with a very expensive phone n can't get any replacement parts for it idk if I can warranty it out but its bull carp. Other then that the phone is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DROP IT! Cases seem imeffective!
customer_reviews.text: I love my phone, but I am tired of fixing the screen each time it drops. Doesn't see! To matter which case. Eventually, the display shatters and it's a big bill to replace it!
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Hill

customer_reviews.title: ASUS ZenFone 3 Deluxe 5.7-inch
customer_reviews.text: It works great no problems, up graded to android 7.0 with no problems like some have reported, orderd a 512g sd card for more storage 6GB of ram was a major selling point. if only ASUS,LOVE MIE,OTTER BOX or UAG would make real protective case for it that would be AWSOME.
customer_reviews.author: WAS7

customer_reviews.title: Good : Battery Drain problem
customer_reviews.text: Everything fine. Battery drains very fast. Thats what I observed
customer_reviews.author: vtparma

customer_reviews.title: Get s very hot and slow
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a fail for me because it gets really hot and slow
customer_reviews.author: yacine

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this phone it's very bad product, stopped working few times over the past ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this phone it's very bad product, stopped working few times over the past two months right after the window closed on return/ support, I paid 374.00 for a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: Adib Antour

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone, but I'm not going to buy Asus phones ever again, there is not software updates, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Gaviria

customer_reviews.title: Love this Phone
customer_reviews.text: I have used this phone for over a year and it charges faster and works better than my friends'.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this phone!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk. Purchased this for my mother and it only lasted her 2 weeks. It stopped charging and the phone won’t turn on. Gets really hot. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Carrie V.

customer_reviews.title: is awesome. I can take pictures almost in the dark
customer_reviews.text: The Asus Zenfone 3 Deluxe phone blows all the competors away. With the onboard 6 gigs ram, 64 gig hard drive, the phone doesn't miss a beat. I'm big into social media and have loaded all my apps as well as their app helpers. My Samsung S5 would slow down and act glitchy, sometimes freezing up. The camera in this phone, 23 megapixel, is awesome. I can take pictures almost in the dark!
customer_reviews.author: Antwerp

customer_reviews.title: Loved previous Asus Phones but going away from them from ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in April. Everything was going well for a few months but now it glitches and turns off the screen while im using it. Keyboard will randomly go away as I'm using it. Very frustrating. Loved previous Asus Phones but going away from them from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Ott

customer_reviews.title: Best phone out there
customer_reviews.text: Best smartphone ever, super fast super easy interface, amazig camara a must ha e ill say
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Please read before considering buying this phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a complete joke compared to my previous phone. This is now the second Zenfone 3 I've owned that the speaker became muffled and distorted and had to send it back to the company under repair. Asus has literally had my phone for 2 months unable to "replicate" the issue and after contacting customer support and being on the phone for over an hour each time they continually tell me they will escalate it. Two months and they refused to acknowledge that the phone is defective. I don't have $500 to throw away on a garbage product and even worse customer service. Obviously Asus, one of the top computer manufacturers isn't even able to stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hill

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is good.
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the phone. Can't beat the price. Gets frequent updates. Battery life is good.
customer_reviews.author: IamTBUCK

customer_reviews.title: Make your kids happy with this phone!
customer_reviews.text: My son has had many phones but he's the happiest I've saw him with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Very good device, all very well organized by Asus
customer_reviews.text: Very good device, all very well organized by Asus. I've been using it for a few weeks. Only defect is that the battery does not last very long, something like 10-12 hours if the use is moderate to severe. On the remaining device Excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Specs are comparable to the Galaxy S8 at a way better price.
customer_reviews.author: LITTELHAWK

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great Phone for the price. I got this phone primarily as a game device for mobile games. Works excellent. Was not about to pay $800 for big name brand phone.
customer_reviews.author: stewatso

customer_reviews.title: No negatives with my phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone, a huge upgrade from my ZenFone 2. It's perfect for those who wanna take beautiful pictures and videos in 4k. So far no negatives.
customer_reviews.author: Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! Two phones from amazon and they both constantly ...
customer_reviews.text: Garbage! Two phones from ASUS purchased on amazon and they both constantly restart once the phone gets too hot. At the least amazon gave be a refund.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so far my favorite phone I've ever owned. Amazing battery life and super quick and responsive.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only con is that you can't move the apps to the sd card

customer_reviews.title: Wish I didn't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a year and I regret buying this model. There little to no options for accessories and when I buy a case or screen protector they never fit. And the headphone jack stopped working after 6 months.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haha two weeks in and it performs great! Love this phone. Premium Phone with a great price!

customer_reviews.title: I didnt believe the bad reviews and decided to see for myself
customer_reviews.text: I didnt believe the bad reviews and decided to see for myself, big mistake. It lasted almost a year but then the screen died. Dont buy this phone

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with ASUS phone
customer_reviews.text: The screen is damaged after one-year normal use. Very disappointed with ASUS phone.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, great prize
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, great prize. Had the ZenFone 2 for two years and it was a great phone so I ordered this ZenFone 3, when I decided to upgrade, and it is just GREAT. A phone with 2 SIM card slots is a must for me and ZenFone 3 is the best.

customer_reviews.title: Another great device from Asus. Works on T-Mobile.
customer_reviews.text: 4G works perfectly with T-Mobile. Don't forget to Enable Mobile Data on chosen SIM (1=Micro, 2=Nano).

customer_reviews.text: Will not connect to WiFi regardless of my location home or work. Results in me using more data. Missed window to return product. Still had issues after contacting Asus help desk.

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Not perfect, mostly because of the stability of the OS. But for this price for a AMOLED phone, 6GB ram. I would still give a 5 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Zenfone 3 Deluxe - very worthy!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Great services. Excellent smartphone! Awesome design, very light and thin. Would highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: It's got great quality and is exactly what she wanted and was ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend and she loves it. It's got great quality and is exactly what she wanted and was hoping for.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and fast i love it and i love the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and fast i love it and i love the pictures and videos.

customer_reviews.text: Took some fiddling around to get the data plan working with AT&T (which they said was incompatible but it DOES work).

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: one of ther best phones i've come into using. I really want another one or the new version
customer_reviews.author: John morales

customer_reviews.title: I was really impressed by the video advertisements and I really like Asus products
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I was expecting...I was really impressed by the video advertisements and I really like Asus products, but when I got this phone and started to set it up....it was just an average phone, camera was not all that good...and most disappointing was how slow it was compared to my old HTC Max ...Sent it back and got Samsung7 edge
customer_reviews.author: M. Malasky

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: Phone is super fast ... no lag on HD games... love the camera ... its beyond something I've ever experienced and sound quality is insane... earphones thee best ... best buy ... thanks Amazon for your great services.

customer_reviews.title: I buy this phone like almost 2 months n now he turn off every ...
customer_reviews.text: I buy this phone like almost 2 months n now he turn off every 5.min why o what I need doing whit this cuz I think its no.good
customer_reviews.author: diego mtz

customer_reviews.title: Slow performance, now a battery issue.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4-2017. I have used ASUS components for PC builds for decades because they are always high quality and reliable. This is my second ZenFone and I am really disappointed. It is slower than the Nexus 6 it replaced. Now, for a week it has been running very warm with a dramatically lower battery life of just a hour or so! That's with power saving on! No new apps so perhaps an update issue. The excellent battery life WAS the best feature...... Bottom line is I am now looking for a Snapdragon 835 replacement for a phone less than a year old!
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. It does more than I expected, and the asus software is great. The camera is the best I've ever seen. The storage is great. There are several things I dislike though, and that is why I gave it three stars. The most annoying thing is the port for charging, etc. has become very loose and the power cord will slide out with any movement. Other issues include the camera turning on at random and taking photos. Also, at times I have to restart the phone to get updates from apps such as instagram, which won't refresh the feed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. Cenerizio

customer_reviews.title: To me this is an awesome phone, everything I expected from a ASUS product
customer_reviews.text: To me this is an awesome phone , everything I expected from a ASUS product. My first computer was a Falcon Northwest (1998) with ASUS , the computers I have built since that time are all ASUS. Now all my electronic commutation devises ( tablet , laptop desktop) are ASUS . Even the sales guy where I bought a belt holster was so impressed that he said this may be his next phone. And it is cheaper than Samsung or Apple. Everyone I have shown this phone to in impressed. I have not been paid or otherwise been given any compensation to promote this product, it is solely on knowing that ASUS is a good product
customer_reviews.author: Joseph m Drapala

customer_reviews.title: Problems with SD Card and terrible sound with headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the device came with a defect, the memory card slot does not recognize any SD Card, so I will never have more than 64 GB capacity. Too bad, I liked the device. Another bad thing is the sound quality, listening with headphones is not a good experience...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it is my handset that is not good or all of the ASUS ZenFone 3
customer_reviews.text: Not sure with the antenna on ASUS ZenFone 3 or jus the handset I received. I still have my Samsung J7. Both of my phones have the same service provider. However, my Samsung J7 shows a full 5 bars signal while the ASUS ZenFone 3 only shows 2 or 3 bars. The signal might be the issue but sending attachment through text does not go through on the ASUS ZenFone 3 while I have no problem with my Samsung J7. So I now revert back to my old Samsung J7 and using the ASUS ZenFone 3 as a camera. :-( Again... Not sure if it is my handset that is not good or all of the ASUS ZenFone 3.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ASUS ZS550KL ZenFone 3 Deluxe Unlocked Dual SIM Cell Phone, 5.5-inch 4GB RAM, 64GB storage, US Warranty (Glacier Silver)
product_meta.description: Size:Deluxe 5.5| Style:4GB RAM/64GB Storage| Offer Type:Phone OnyASUS ZenFone 3 Deluxe 5.5-inch 4GB RAM, 64GB storage Unlocked Dual SIM Cell Phone. ZenFone 3 Deluxe delivers exceptional performance, including a Snapdragon 625 processor, up to 4GB memory and desktop-grade Adreno 506 graphics performance. It also has up to 600Mbps (Category 13) 4G LTE, any-way-up USB-C 3.0, rapid fingerprint security, and fast-charge technology that whizzes the battery level up to 60% in just 39 minutes.
feature_bullets: ZenFone 3 Deluxe with PureMetal technology integrates antennas for gapless beauty and uncompromise signal quaility
Corning Gorilla Glass 4 gives you the touchest protection for this vibrant Full HD Display
With Qualcomm Snapdragon 625 and Adreno 506 graphics you get powerful processor performance, beautifully designed
Quick Charge technology using USB-C 3.0 gives a ligthning fast charge up to 60% in 40 minutes
PixelMaster 3.0 has TriTech auto-focus for shake-free photos and rock steady video in just 0.03 seconds. There is no HDMI connector or feature on this device.
